00021 // $Id: vectors.h,v 1.1 2008/10/27 23:26:31 cp71 Exp $

00023 #ifndef VECTORS_H
00024 #define VECTORS_H 1
00025 
00026 #include <cstring>
00027 #include <cassert>
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include "wrapper.h"
00030 
00031 
00032 class FVector;
00033 class SVector;
00034 
00035 typedef float VFloat;
00036 
00037 class FVector
00038 {
00039 private:
00040   struct Rep
00041   {
00042     int refcount;
00043     int size;
00044     VFloat *data;
00045     Rep() : size(0), data(0) {}
00046     ~Rep() { delete [] data; }
00047     void resize(int n);
00048     Rep *copy();
00049   };
00050   
00051   Wrapper<Rep> w;
00052   Rep *rep() { return w.rep(); }
00053   const Rep *rep() const { return w.rep(); }
00054   void qset(int i, double v);
00055   
00056 public:
00057   FVector();
00058   FVector(int n);
00059   FVector(const SVector &v);
00060   int size() const { return rep()->size; }
00061 
00062   // these accessors are range-checked.
00063   // get() returns 0 when i is out-of-range.
00064   // set() expands the vector.
00065   double get(int i) const;
00066   double set(int i, double v);
00067 
00068   // warning: you can write vector[i] but
00069   // the subscripts are not range-checked!
00070   // on the other hand, that's fast.
00071   operator const VFloat* () const { return rep()->data; }
00072   operator VFloat* () { w.detach(); return rep()->data; }
00073 
00074   void clear();
00075   void resize(int n);
00076   void touch(int i);
00077   FVector slice(int fi, int ti) const;
00078 
00079   void add(double c1);
00080   void add(const FVector &v2);
00081   void add(const SVector &v2);
00082   void add(const FVector &v2, double c2);
00083   void add(const SVector &v2, double c2);
00084   void add(const FVector &v2, double c2, const FVector &q2);
00085   void add(const SVector &v2, double c2, const FVector &q2);
00086   void scale(double c1);
00087   void combine(double c1, const FVector &v2, double c2);
00088   void combine(double c1, const SVector &v2, double c2);
00089 
00090 
00091   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &f, const FVector &v);
00092   friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &f, FVector &v);
00093   bool save(std::ostream &f) const;
00094   bool load(std::istream &f);
00095 };
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099 class SVector
00100 {
00101 public:
00102   struct Pair 
00103   { 
00104     int i; 
00105     VFloat v; 
00106   };
00107 private:
00108   struct Rep
00109   {
00110     int refcount;
00111     int npairs;
00112     int mpairs;
00113     int size;
00114     struct Pair *pairs;
00115     
00116     Rep() : npairs(0), mpairs(-1), size(0), pairs(0) {}
00117     ~Rep() { delete [] pairs; }
00118     void resize(int n);
00119     double qset(int i, double v);
00120     Rep *copy();
00121   };
00122   
00123   Wrapper<Rep> w;
00124   Rep *rep() { return w.rep(); }
00125   const Rep *rep() const { return w.rep(); }
00126   
00127 public:
00128   SVector();
00129   SVector(const FVector &v);
00130   int size() const { return rep()->size; }
00131 
00132   // these accessors are range-checked.
00133   // get() returns 0 when i is out-of-range.
00134   // set() expands the vector.
00135   double get(int i) const;
00136   double set(int i, double v);
00137 
00138   // to quickly iterate over the non-zero coefficients,
00139   // do for(SVector::Pair *p = x; p->i>=0; p++) { ... }
00140   int npairs() const { return rep()->npairs; }
00141   operator const Pair* () const { return rep()->pairs; }
00142 
00143   void clear();
00144   void trim();
00145   SVector slice(int fi, int ti) const;
00146 
00147   void add(const SVector &v2);
00148   void add(const SVector &v2, double c2);
00149   void scale(double c1);
00150   void combine(double c1, const SVector &v2, double c2);
00151 
00152   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &f, const SVector &v);
00153   friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &f, SVector &v);
00154   bool save(std::ostream &f) const;
00155   bool load(std::istream &f);
00156 
00157   friend SVector combine(const SVector &v1, double a1, 
00158                          const SVector &v2, double a2);
00159 };
00160 
00161 double dot(const FVector &v1, const FVector &v2);
00162 double dot(const FVector &v1, const SVector &v2);
00163 double dot(const SVector &v1, const FVector &v2);
00164 double dot(const SVector &v1, const SVector &v2);
00165 
00166 SVector combine(const SVector &v1, double a1, const SVector &v2, double a2);
00167 FVector combine(const FVector &v1, double a1, const SVector &v2, double a2);
00168 FVector combine(const SVector &v1, double a1, const FVector &v2, double a2);
00169 FVector combine(const FVector &v1, double a1, const FVector &v2, double a2);
00170 
00171 
00172 
00173 #endif
